title: Manual QA testing
description: Perform manual testing: 1) All settings forms on mobile/desktop, 2) Account deletion flow with various scenarios, 3) Meta callback with valid/invalid signatures, 4) Verify all data is deleted in database, 5) Verify Instagram tokens are revoked, 6) Verify sessions are invalidated. Document any bugs found.
dod: Manual QA performed on all settings page forms
Tested on mobile and desktop viewports
Account deletion tested with complete dataset
Database verified after deletion (all related records gone)
Instagram token revocation verified (API logs checked)
Session invalidation verified (cannot access after deletion)
Meta callback tested with Meta's webhook testing tool
QA results documented with any bugs found
